about_the_game:
Ragdoll Chimps is a Physics-Based Sandbox with a Huge Open World, and Tons of Activities. Farming, Mining, Fishing, Collectibles, Quests, Customization, Fighting, Racing, Mini-Games, and More! Enjoy it in Singleplayer, or Split-Screen Co-op and PVP modes.


Explore a Vibrant Open-World, Filled with diverse biomes and settlements, secret locations, challenges, activities and quests.

  • Farming: Build a farm, use crafting to make machinery and fully automate it.

  • Mining: Deep caverns are unexplored and full of dangers, but contain valuable metals.

  • Fishing: Enjoy the serene beauty of lakes, oceans, and rivers. Relax on a gently rowing boat, and try to collect all of the fish.

  • Fighting: Whether it's boxing, sword fighting, or shooting, we got it all covered in our Arenas.

  • Establish your Gang: Hire street hooligans, and capture city zones, to expand your influence.

  • Play Mini-Games: Alone, or with your friends, enjoy a selection of multiple Mini-Games, such as Tag, Hide and Seek, Hot Potato, and more!

  • Collect: Across the vast world there are many things to collect, lot of secrets to uncover.

  • Race: Participate in furious races on Land, in Air, and in Water.

  • Parkour Platforming: You will need to use your platforming skills to reach some of the secret locations.

  • Puzzles: Ancient Tombs and Temples are filled with untold treasures. But to get those, you must pass their traps and solve their puzzles.

  • Quests: There are all sorts of whacky and chaotic characters inhabiting the world of Ragdoll Chimps. Many of them need your help with diverse set of quests.

  • Customization: Go shopping in a mall, choose your style of clothing, the color of your fur, fingernails, skin, eyes, even your tongue. Go to the gym to build some muscle, or eat everything you can, to reach impressive sizes.

    All of these in an advanced Physically Simulated environment, with Active Ragdoll characters.

    Cause Chaos, Have Fun, This world has no limitations!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2GB VRAM) or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB VRAM) or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible
